original_title: Anxiety of Inexpression and the Otherness Machine
overview: Director Quentin Lee shoots a pseudo-documentary about himself, his family, friends, and his lover, in an experimental pastiche of genres. As if in retaliation to the stern image, each sequence is ruptured by self-conscious meditations on the construction of ethnicity and the self within Western culture.
title: Anxiety of Inexpression and the Otherness Machine
